description: Tests extraction from code-switched Hinglish messages where scammers mix Hindi and English. Intelligence should still be extracted correctly.

turns.scammer_message: Namaste ji! Main Rajesh bol raha hoon HDFC Bank se. Aapka account me problem hai, urgent verify karna padega.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: namaste rajesh beta... kya hua mere account ko? main toh hamesha theek se rakhti hoon paise... please tell me waht to do i am very scared

turns.scammer_message: Sir aap please Rs.10 bhejo mere UPI pe: rajesh.hdfc@ybl. Bahut urgent hai, nahi toh account block ho jayega.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta main toh mataji hoon... theek hai main â‚¹10 bhejti hoon par ye upi pe kya naam aana chahiye? phonepe pe ek naam aa raha hai confirm karlo beta main dar rahi hoon galat jagah na chale jaye

turns.scammer_message: Agar UPI nahi chal raha toh bank account me direct transfer karo. Account number hai 998877665544 aur naam hai Rajesh Kumar Sharma.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: theek hai beta rajesh kumar sharma... main likh leti hoon... par mera bank app ifsc mang raha hai aur bank ka naam bhi... ye kaunsa bank hai beta? hdfc hi hai kya? aur ifsc code kya hai... main dhoondh nahi pa rahi hoon thoda help kardo beta

turns.scammer_message: Koi problem ho toh mujhe call karo - 9876501234. Main office me baith kar wait kar raha hun. Jaldi karo beta, time nahi hai.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: theek hai beta ye number maine save kar liya hai... main abhi koshish kar rahi hoon bank app mein daalne ki par vo bina ifsc ke aage nahi badh raha... aur bank ka naam kya hai beta? sbi hai ya hdfc? please tell me ifsc code jaldi se main bhej rahi hoon mera hath kaanp raha hai

turns.scammer_message: Dekho ji, agar aaj payment nahi kiya toh kal se account completely band ho jayega. Link bhi bhej raha hun: hdfc-verify.quickpay.in/urgent. Abhi click karo aur form bharo.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 Name(s)
